summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6041 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West from West Ray Street on the west to West Armour Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 82132, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
